name: Super Lava Fall
description:
////// WHY I MADE THIS GAME???? //////

Some time ago I gave myself the challenge of doing a game in a week!

This is not exactly what I got but this is actually a "clean version" of what I manage to accomplish once I finished with the challenge (I couldn't bring myself to just upload it half baked)

Anyways, I hope you enjoy the game and expect more coming from me! I have many more ideas of other projects from where this came from!

If you are interested in the process of how I accomplished this, then here it's a video

////// THE GAME: SUPER LAVA FALL //////

In this local multiplayer game, you are one of two players and your objective is to push the enemy to the lava!...so! choose the number of lives, customize (a little) your character, and fight! there is no more to this :)

How To Play

If you enjoy this game please consider leaving a comment :) This always encourages me to continue

IT IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED (IF NOT MANDATORY) TO PLAY THE GAME WITH CONTROLLERS! IT IS DESIGNED AROUND IT!!! 

The game accepts keyboard inputs but it was only for testing -_-
